name: Chez Croggy
description:
Chez Croggy is a third-person single player platformer where the goal is simple. Get to the stove before time runs out. Guide our fearless protagonist Chef Croggy as he faces the gauntlet of Shibukamulizu kitchen incorporations.

Features

  • 20 different levels
  • Various set of player mechanics
  • Countless amount of obstacles to avoid
  • Music produced by DJ Dilashister
  • Isometric style camera
  • BOXES
